Sphere function

class mimic.benchmark.Sphere.sphere

Bases: Function_meta

Sphere benchmark function

forward(individual) → float

Output objective function value

Parameters:

individual (core.Individual.Individual) – Individual

Returns:

Objective function value.

Return type:

float

Function is written below.

\[f(\boldsymbol{x}) = \Sigma_i x_i^2\]

The best solution is

\[\boldsymbol{x}^* = \boldsymbol{0}\]
